Uses of Package
com.vmware.appliance.vcenter.settings.v1.config.components.inventory.cluster.drs

  • Packages that use com.vmware.appliance.vcenter.settings.v1.config.components.inventory.cluster.drs 
    Package Description
    com.vmware.appliance.vcenter.settings.v1.config.components.inventory.cluster
    The com.vmware.appliance.vcenter.settings.v1.config.components.inventory.cluster package provides interfaces to manage the vCenter Server Inventory cluster configurations
    com.vmware.appliance.vcenter.settings.v1.config.components.inventory.cluster.drs
    The com.vmware.appliance.vcenter.settings.v1.config.components.inventory.cluster.drs package provides interfaces to manage the vCenter Server Inventory Cluster DRS settings.
  • Classes in com.vmware.appliance.vcenter.settings.v1.config.components.inventory.cluster.drs used by com.vmware.appliance.vcenter.settings.v1.config.components.inventory.cluster 
    Class and Description
    DrsConfig
    The DrsConfig class contains properties describing the HA specific configurations of a cluster.
    DrsFactory
    DrsFactory is responsible for creating instances of services contained inside the com.vmware.appliance.vcenter.settings.v1.config.components.inventory.cluster.drs package and also has the subpackages reference to access respective subpackage services.
    DrsVmOverrides
    The DrsVmOverrides class contains the fields describing DRS behavior override for individual virtual machines in the cluster.
    Group
    The Group class describes the properties of virtual machine and host groups.
    ProactiveHAConfig
    The ProactiveHAConfig class defines the Configuration of the vSphere InfraUpdateHA service on a cluster.
    Rule
    The Rule class describes affinity and anti-affinity DRS rules that affect the placement of virtual machines in a cluster.
  • Classes in com.vmware.appliance.vcenter.settings.v1.config.components.inventory.cluster.drs used by com.vmware.appliance.vcenter.settings.v1.config.components.inventory.cluster.drs

    AdditionalOptions
    The AdditionalOptions class contains properties describing the HA specific configurations of a cluster.

    The AffinityRule class defines a set of virtual machines that DRS will attempt to run on the same host.
